item.description:
Do to overwhelming request for another MFA date, please join us at the MFA after work on Friday Aug 3rd.  This is the late Friday evening 5.30 - 9.30 pm event at the MFA - in the Calderwood Courtyard outside with live music and a cash bar & people dancing...let your hair down at the end of a hot work week...take in some art....have a glass of wine etc.  Meet some old and new friends!   We will head in around 6pm or a few miutes after.  BE SURE TO GET THERE ON TIME, BY 5:30, AS THE PLACE FILLS UP EARLY AND THEY TURN PEOPLE AWAY.  Last week I heard they stopped admitting around 6:45 or 7pm

There were some posted questions about attending if RSVP's are full, especially people who are already members.  If you don't RSVP in time to be one of the 20 attendees, of course this is a public event that you or anyone can attend and general rules of friendly etiquette apply!  It is just that the place will be a zoo and it will be hard to keep in contact while socializing even with 20.  As to the other question about guests, - so that the max number of CV members can attend, guests are not counted in the 20, - you can bring guests, they just won't be "officially" in the "meetup". 

I will email my phone # before the event to attendees so if you miss us in the foyer you can call when/if you get in.  If you get lost or have free time in the courtyard, we will try to commandeer a table or two and/or the stone seats in the corner to the left of the band to congregate.  Look at everyones pictures so we know who is going.  I will try to bring a copy of the pictures and will keep an eye out to say hi & introduce people.

A member said that the MFA will be free on Friday Aug 3 courtesy of Highlandstreet.org Free Summer Fridays program - thanks. We will verify that in the meantime - if anyone knows for certain post the info please. 

http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/mfa-summer-fridays
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the foyer near the store, at 5:15pm, and we will head in around 5:30pm. Look for Bill (6'4") glasses.
item.name: Summer Friday at MFA
